note.p: Dutch chemist. Studied classical literature and natural sciences at Utrecht. Professor of physics and chemistry at the Royal Athenaeum in Maastricht, 1845–7. Professor of chemistry at the Athenaeum Illustre in Amsterdam, 1848–65. Perpetual secretary of the Koninklijke Hollandsche Maatschappij der Wetenschappen (Royal Holland Society of Sciences and Humanities), Haarlem, 1865–85. Edited the Archives néerlandaises des sciences exactes et naturelles.
